languages.text: Новый путь — Путь Воина, — вел Ирлиэт, и она надеялась, что никогда он не заставит ее поднять оружие против смертных, ставших ей верными товарищами.
Yrliet followed a new Path, the Path of the Warrior. She only hoped she would never be forced to raise her weapon against the mortals who had become her true brothers and sisters in arms.
languages.original_text: Новый путь — Путь Воина, — вел Ирлиэт, и она надеялась, что никогда он не заставит ее поднять оружие против смертных, ставших ей верными товарищами.

traits.locale_text: A new Path, Path of the Warrior, led Yrliet. She only hoped that it will never force her to raise her arms against the mortals who became true comrades for her.
A new Path, Path of the Warrior, led Yrliet. She only hoped that it will never force her to raise her arms against the mortals who became true comrades for her.
Yrliet followed a new Path, the Path of the Warrior. She only hoped it would never force her to raise arms against the mortals who had become true comrades to her.
Yrliet followed a new Path, the Path of the Warrior. She only hoped it would never force her to raise arms against the mortals who had become true comrades to her.
Yrliet followed a new Path, the Path of the Warrior. She only hoped she would never be forced to raise her weapon against the mortals who had become her true brothers and sisters in arms.
Yrliet followed a new Path, the Path of the Warrior. She only hoped she would never be forced to raise her weapon against the mortals who had become her true brothers and sisters in arms.

languages.text: 伊莉耶特踏上了身为战士的新道途。她只希望，这条道途不会迫使她举起武器，攻击那些已经为她真正战友的人类。
languages.original_text: Yrliet followed a new Path, the Path of the Warrior. She only hoped she would never be forced to raise her weapon against the mortals who had become her true brothers and sisters in arms.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特踏上了身为战士的新道途。她只希望，这条道途不会迫使她举起武器，攻击那些已经为她真正战友的人类。

languages.text: Yrliet befolgte einen neuen Pfad, den Pfad des Kriegers. Sie hoffte nur, sie würde nie gezwungen sein, ihre Waffe gegen die Sterblichen zu erheben, die ihr zu wahren Waffenbrüdern und -schwestern geworden waren.
languages.original_text: Yrliet followed a new Path, the Path of the Warrior. She only hoped she would never be forced to raise her weapon against the mortals who had become her true brothers and sisters in arms.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet befolgte einen neuen Pfad, den Pfad des Kriegers. Sie hoffte nur, dass er sie niemals zwingen würde, die Waffe gegen die Sterblichen erheben zu müssen, die für sie zu wahren Kameraden geworden waren.

languages.text: Yrliet s'engagea sur une nouvelle Voie, celle du Guerrier. Elle n'espérait qu'une chose : que ce chemin ne la mène pas à lever son arme contre les mortels qui étaient devenus de véritables frères et sœurs d'armes à ses yeux.
languages.original_text: Yrliet followed a new Path, the Path of the Warrior. She only hoped she would never be forced to raise her weapon against the mortals who had become her true brothers and sisters in arms.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet s’engagea sur une nouvelle Voie, celle du Guerrier. Elle n’espérait qu'une chose : que ce chemin ne la mène pas à entrer en conflit avec les mortels qui étaient devenus de véritables frères et sœurs d’armes à ses yeux.

languages.text: Yrliet siguió una nueva Senda: la del Guerrero. Solo esperaba que nunca la llevara a alzar sus armas contra los mortales que se habían convertido en auténticos camaradas para ella.
languages.original_text: Yrliet followed a new Path, the Path of the Warrior. She only hoped she would never be forced to raise her weapon against the mortals who had become her true brothers and sisters in arms.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet siguió una nueva Senda: la del Guerrero. Solo esperaba que nunca la llevara a alzar sus armas contra los mortales que se habían convertido en auténticos camaradas para ella.

languages.text: ユリエットは新しい道、戦士の道を歩んでいた。彼女はただ、自分にとって真の仲間となった戦友たちに対して武器を振りかざすことを強要されることが決してないようにとだけ願っていた。
languages.original_text: Yrliet followed a new Path, the Path of the Warrior. She only hoped she would never be forced to raise her weapon against the mortals who had become her true brothers and sisters in arms.

traits.locale_text: ユリエットは新しい道、戦士の道を歩んでいた。彼女はただ、自分にとって真の仲間となった戦友たちに対して武器を振りかざすことを強要されることが決してないようにとだけ願っていた。

languages.text: Yrliet kendine yeni Yol olarak Savaşçının Yolu'nu seçti. Tek istediği, gerçek silah arkadaşları olan ölümlülere karşı asla silahını kullanmak zorunda kalmamaktı.
languages.original_text: Yrliet followed a new Path, the Path of the Warrior. She only hoped she would never be forced to raise her weapon against the mortals who had become her true brothers and sisters in arms.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet kendine yeni bir Yol seçti: Savaşçının Yolu. Tek istediği, onun gerçek silah arkadaşları hâline gelen ölümlülere karşı asla silahını kullanmak zorunda kalmamaktı.
